metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6548 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free issue was discovered in libwebm through 2018-02-02. If aVp9HeaderParser was initialized once before, its property frame_ would notbe changed because of code in vp9parser::Vp9HeaderParser::SetFrame. Itsframe_ could be freed while the corresponding pointer would not be updated,leading to a dangling pointer. This is related to the functionOutputCluster in webm_info.cc.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
